Planed Updates and features!

TankShark.IO is constantly upgrading, with a steady stream of updates and features planned to expand gameplay and improve the overall experience. Here's a sneak peek at what's coming soon:

🏰 Team Bases: Build, upgrade, and defend your own team base in a new strategic layer of gameplay.

  • Base Creation: Cost: 10,000 points (from the player or team score). Bases start with 2,000 health, no turrets, and a stationary, non-rotating structure.
  • Base Mobility: Bases are immobile once placed. They can be destroyed by enemies but cannot be moved — at least for now. This may change in future updates.
  • Leadership Perks: Team leaders will gain the ability to boost allied player stats (health, speed, damage). Boosts cost 200 points per stat and stack with the player's current score and upgrades.
  • New Base Design: Bases will take on an all-new octagon shape for better spatial strategy and uniqueness.
  • Base Upgrades: Add turrets, increase health, and unlock new functions. Each base will have a “boost sphere” that grants stat bonuses to allied players inside. Planned upgrade paths include:
    • Health
    • Movement Speed
    • Damage Output
    • Bullet Speed
    • Reload Time

🗺️ Mini-Map Upgrade: Players will soon be able to upgrade their mini-maps to track teammates in real time. This strategic enhancement will cost 3,000 points (player or team-funded).

💥 Physics Enhancements: New knock-back effects and improved explosion mechanics are on the way. An anti-knockback upgrade may also be introduced for defensive playstyles.

🎨 Graphics Overhaul:

  • New animations and visuals for a smoother, more immersive look.
  • Player death animations to add polish and impact to every match.

⚖️ Game Balance: Ongoing weapon and mechanic tuning to ensure fair, competitive gameplay for all skill levels.

🛡️ New Skins: Regularly released tank skins to keep gameplay visually fresh. Have a skin idea? Share it with us — the development team is actively listening for community suggestions!

🐞 Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements:

  • Fixing the visual bug causing boss drones to teleport to the center instead of properly launching from the cannon.
  • Correcting layout issues in the team panel on mobile devices.
  • Improving screen layout for devices between 700px and 800px in width.
  • Resolving a bug that allows players to move while dead using cannon knock-back.

These updates are just the beginning. The future of TankShark.IO is shaped by you — the community — and we're building it together. Stay tuned, stay sharp, and keep dominating the arena!

How to Play

  • Welcome to TankShark.IO! Start by choosing a username and clicking "Play." Use your mouse to aim and steer your tank. Left-click to shoot, right-click to interact with objects. Your goal: survive, earn points, and dominate the battlefield. Watch your health and score to track progress.
  • Movement is everything. Use arrow keys or WASD to move, and the mouse to aim your cannon independently. This split control lets you shoot while dodging. Master it to outmaneuver enemies and stay alive.
  • As you roam the map, you’ll face enemies, bosses, and chances to earn points. Spend points to upgrade your tank—boost speed, health, damage, or reload time. Choose wisely; upgrades are key to survival.
  • Teams can turn the tide. Join or create one to coordinate with others. Use the team panel to manage members or send invites. Teams can share resources and strategies—but be ready for betrayals.
  • Customize your tank and settings. Pick a skin, toggle dark mode, hide player names, or adjust chat visibility. Set things up to match your play style.
  • The map is big and dangerous. Use the terrain to dodge fire and set traps. Keep moving to stay alive and look for every chance to earn points and upgrade your tank.
  • Whether you fight solo or team up, TankShark.IO is packed with action and competition. Stay sharp, adapt fast, and aim for the top. Good luck out there!

About TankShark.IO

TankShark.IO was founded by a young entrepreneur with a vision to redefine the world of IO games. The goal was simple yet ambitious: to take the best elements of popular IO games, refine them, and introduce innovative features that enhance the overall experience and to provide consistent updates weekly. This is were most other IO games fall short, adding little to no content after their created. By combining the excitement of multiplayer gameplay with thoughtful tweaks and improvements, TankShark.IO aims to set a new standard in the genre. What started as a passion project quickly grew into a thriving platform, attracting players from around the globe who craved something more immersive, more tactical, and more fun.

At its core, TankShark.IO is all about delivering a dynamic, engaging space where players can explore, compete, and team up. Set in a vast open-world arena, you control customizable tanks with unique looks and abilities. Whether you're in it for casual fun or serious competition, the game has you covered—with intense battles, ranked play, team missions, and co-op events. It's built to match your playstyle, rewarding sharp reflexes and smart strategy alike.

One of TankShark.IO's standout features is its community-driven development. Updates and new content are shaped by player feedback, ensuring the game grows with its audience. From new skins and modes to seasonal events and experimental features, fresh gameplay is always on the way. Player suggestions don't just get noticed—they're built into the game's roadmap, creating a real partnership between the developers and the community.

TankShark.IO puts a strong focus on accessibility and inclusivity. Its simple controls and user-friendly interface make it easy for newcomers to jump in, while its depth keeps veteran players engaged. Custom tank builds, team play, tournaments, and a global leaderboard add strategy and personalization to every match. With language support, cross-platform play, and low system requirements, anyone, anywhere can get in on the action.

Behind the scenes, the TankShark.IO team works hard to keep the game safe and respectful. With anti-cheat systems, active moderation, and a clear code of conduct, the goal is to ensure a fair, welcoming space where players of all backgrounds can enjoy the game free from toxicity or cheating.

Join the TankShark.IO community today and feel the rush of online multiplayer action like never before. Combining strategy, innovation, and fast-paced fun, TankShark.IO isn’t just a game—it’s a new era for IO gaming. Jump in, gear up your tank, and fight your way to the top. The arena is ready.
